Name: Roma VR - Domus
About the game: TRAVEL BACK IN TIME In the year 79 A.D the great volcano Mt.Vesuvius buried the ancient Roman town of Pompeii in a cataclysmic eruption. Today the famous ruins of Pompeii and it's inhabitants lay still for the world to see, but the ancient Pompeiians would not recognize their home if the were to see it. Travel back to the year 79 A.D before the eruption of Mt.Vesuvius and see the famous house of an ancient Roman banker before it was destroyed by the volcano. Experience the vibrant colors of ancient life and learn about the ancient home and it's unusual ways. FEATURES FULL IMMERSION Walk through the halls of an ancient Roman building in immersive Virtual Reality, with realistic graphics, lighting and sound design. GUIDED TOUR Take a guided tour of the restored House of Iucundus, learn about how he lived and life in ancient Pompeii. This voice guided tour will take you all through the ancient Domus and explain how each space was used. FREE ROAM Explore the restored House of Iucundus on your own, discover and relive the beautiful restored Roman Domus in Virtual Reality. EARLY ACCESS This title is in early access and we appreciate patience and feedback while we work to finish this VR experience. Many more features and spaces in the house will open as we continue development and will be announced in turn.
